Content:

Content: before it just sent and if any didnt make it, you get gaps and death

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: and the nymph stealing one of the more than one item corrupting the pack... that was nasty bug

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: now the nymph will steal all of whatever pack item, so if 4 healing potions, all 4 will be gone

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: looking at the code that is what i think was intended

Author: TonyL#3577
Content: TUI checking a lot of stuff atm: waiting for registration to be mined, will not allow to bailout if game not started, checking for errors in keystroke tx and rebroadcast it (may help if last keystroke had error), if there are 0 keystrokes it will try to wait also and not allow to bailout

Author: TonyL#3577
Content: + now waiting for last keystokes confirmation and as mega feature even after all these steps player can just try to wait one more block if he dont like extract print

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: looking at the code I can easily believe there are more nymph stealing multiple object items type of bug, that was non-deterministic as it all depended on what the system did with the freed memory

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: in the middle keystrokes, I just sendrawtransaction until it returns an error (most likely due to being onchain already)

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: if not, it waits till the next level

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: if that isnt enough, I have code ready that extracts the current game and compares to local keystrokes and a way to adjust the next keystrokes if needed, but it could be we need a special "patch keystrokes" with a diff sent as a new tx. want to avoid this complexity if at all possible

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: if we can reduce the error rate to less than 1%, that would just be part of the game
